Title: The Coronation
Writer: Michael Dante DiMartino (created by), Tim Hedrick, Bryan Konietzko (created by)
Actors: Janet Varney, David Faustino, P.J. Byrne, J.K. Simmons
Plot: The Coronation of the new King of Earth Kingdom while Kuvira Does not agree with it. While on other hand Korra is practicing with Toph to better herself.
